original_text: Ye shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.
korean_text: 너희는 다 흠 없는 것으로 상번제와 그 소제와 전제 외에 그것들을 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Ye shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 계속 번제물 곁에 그것들을 드릴지니

sentences.original_text: they shall be unto you without blemish
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 흠 없이 너희에게 있을 것이며
